mentionedBy.name: Aspen Technology Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Process simulation alternative facilitating modeling, evaluation, and optimization of integrated batch and continuous processes. Serves biotech, pharmaceutical, specialty chemical, food processing, consumer goods, metallurgical, materials, water purification, wastewater treatment, and air pollution control industries.
